description: Dataset containing technical specifications, fuel characteristics, and performance metrics of cars, along with their market prices.

columns.description: Unique identifier assigned to each car record in the dataset.
Indicates whether the car uses gasoline as its fuel type.
Indicates whether the car’s engine is turbocharged.
Indicates whether the car has four doors.
Indicates whether the car has a front-mounted engine configuration.
Distance between the centers of the front and rear wheels of the car, measured in inches.
Overall length of the car, measured in inches.
Overall width of the car, measured in inches.
Overall height of the car, measured in inches.
Total displacement volume of the car’s engine, measured in cubic centimeters (cc).
Maximum power output of the car’s engine, measured in horsepower (hp).
Engine speed (in revolutions per minute) at which maximum horsepower is achieved.
Fuel efficiency of the car in city driving conditions, measured in miles per gallon.
Fuel efficiency of the car during highway driving, measured in miles per gallon.
Manufacturer’s suggested retail price or market price of the car, expressed in monetary units.
